document_data.name: Haedro Sornstern
document_data.mainbody: Lord '''Haedro Sornstern''' was a nobleman from [[Cormyr]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: He was the father of [[Delasko Sornstern]].
document_data.Personality: Haedro Sornstern had a hobby: he liked to learn of adventuring lore, and collecting relics.
document_data.History: He had, some years prior to [[1479 DR]], helped hide the fugitive wizard [[Elminster Aumar]], for which Elminster let him learn of the fate of [[the Nine]] and how they were imprisoned in [[blueflame item]]s after being lured into an assignment by a merchant from [[Athkatla]].
